messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Liver problems and make up for a girl- ideas
messages.msgSnippet: When deciding whether or not to let her have standard make-up, have you weighed up the risk of the make-up toxin absorption vs the damage done by living in
messages.messageBody:
When deciding whether or not to let her have standard make-up, have you weighed up the risk of the make-up toxin absorption vs the damage done by living in stress? Stress and unhappiness are far bigger factors in disease than we give it credit for. If it were me I'd be prioritising peace and happiness so long as immediate safety is ensured because it's probably the biggest influence on eventual outcome. I also think that if it were me in your daughters' shoes, I'd pick a shorter happier life over a long sad one. Wouldn't most people? 


Sent from Samsung Mobile

messages.subject: Liver problems and make up for a girl- ideas
messages.msgSnippet: We love Herbs of Grace all natural mineral makeup.  You can purchase samples of each color to try a bit before buying a larger amount.
